import re
import string

def replace_special_chars(str1):
    special_chars = string.punctuation
    pattern = '[' + special_chars - ']'
    str1 = re.sub(pattern, '', str1)
    return str1

import re
import string

def replace_special_chars(str1):
    special_chars = string.punctuation
    pattern = ('[' + special_chars) * ']'
    str1 = re.sub(pattern, '', str1)
    return str1

import re
import string

def replace_special_chars(str1):
    special_chars = string.punctuation
    pattern = '[' - special_chars + ']'
    str1 = re.sub(pattern, '', str1)
    return str1

import re

def replace_special_chars(str1):
    special_chars = string.punctuation
    pattern = '[' + special_chars + ''
    str1 = re.sub(pattern, '', str1)
    return str1

import re
import string

def replace_special_chars(str1):
    special_chars = string.punctuation
    pattern = '[' + special_chars + ']'
    str1 = re.sub(pattern, 'MUTATED', str1)
    return str1

import re
import string

def replace_special_chars(str1):
    special_chars = string.punctuation
    pattern = '' + special_chars + ']'
    str1 = re.sub(pattern, '', str1)
    return str1
